title: OKX BONK Airdrop Announcement
body:
OKX is launching the BONK campaign – BONK airdrop – on November 7, 2024, at
06:00 UTC, and for you to earn extra BONK rewards.  

###  **About BONK airdrop**

 **Eligibility**

  * Complete identity verification

  * Stake at least 10,000 BONK to be eligible to receive airdrop rewards

  
 **How to participate?**

The campaign is available on the OKX app and web.

Note: Using a sub-account to participate in the campaign is ineligible.  

 **Rules**

  * Before the campaign starts, we’ll take a snapshot of your BONK On-chain Earn subscriptions on **November 7, 2024 at 06:00 UTC**. This snapshot will determine your baseline holdings.

  * We’ll take daily snapshots at 6:00 am UTC of your On-chain Earn subscriptions during the campaign period. The average increased subscription amount from the baseline snapshot, or “average increment” will determine the size of your rewards. This means you should stake as much as possible as early as possible during the campaign period to maximize your rewards.

  
 **Campaign details**

 **Campaign period**

|

 **Prize pool**

|

 **Reward Token**  
  
---|---|---  
  
[November 7, 2024, 06:00 UTC – December 7, 2024, 06:00 UTC]

|

2,129,500,000 **** BONK

|

BONK  
  
 **Rewards distribution**

  * Your airdrop rewards = (Your average increment / Total average increment) × Prize pool

  * Example (for illustrative purposes only):

    * User A has 5 BONK staked at the initial snapshot taken on November 1.

    * He stakes another 5 BONK on the first day of the 31-day campaign, giving him a total of 10 BONK.

    * He stakes another 5 BONK on day 15 of the campaign, giving him a total of 15 BONK. He does nothing else for the remainder of the campaign.

    * User A's average increment is calculated as follows:

      * (10 x 15 + 15 x 16) / 31 - 5 = 7.58 BONK

    * Assuming that the total average increment of users participating in the campaign is 1,000 BONK, and the prize pool is 10,000 BONK. User A's airdrop rewards will be calculated as follows:

      * User A's airdrop rewards = (7.58 BONK) / (1,000 BONK) × (10,000 BONK) = 75.8 BONK

  
 **Terms & Conditions**

  1. The "BONK Airdrop" promotion starts at **06:00 UTC on November 7, 2024** , **** and ends at **06:00 UTC on December 7, 2024.** (the "Promotion Period").

  2. By default, users who enter the campaign page and participate in this campaign have read and understood the Terms & Conditions of this campaign.

  3. Participation in this campaign is restricted to the main account only. Sub-accounts are not eligible to participate. The earnings of sub-accounts will not be included in the calculation of the earnings of the main account.

This may happen in cases where platform restrictions in certain jurisdictions cause participants to be ineligible for certain campaign rewards, where OKX is unable to procure the prizes for the participants, or in any case that OKX deems in its full discretion that it is necessary for the rewards to be converted.

title: Compound v3 (Ethereum) - USDC On-chain Earn product & event launch announcement
body:
OKX will offer Compound v3 on Ethereum in On-chain Earn, starting from **11:00
am UTC on October 21, 2024**. This new offering gives users a chance to
experience hassle-free on-chain rewards and earn additional rewards for the
first three weeks.

**General rules on rewards and distribution**

  * **USDC rewards** : Users earn USDC rewards by depositing USDC into the Compound v3 protocol (Ethereum) using On-chain Earn. Rewards will be distributed when users redeem their principal.
  * **COMP rewards** : Users earn COMP rewards by depositing USDC into the Compound v3 protocol (Ethereum) using On-chain Earn. Rewards will be distributed to users' accounts every day.

**Additional Compound v3 rewards**  
Starting from **3 am UTC on October 22, 2024** , USDC subscriptions in On-
chain Earn Compound v3 (Ethereum) will earn extra rewards. The total rewards
available are:

  * **Week 1 439.65 COMP**
  * **Week 2 10,000 USDC**
  * **Week 3 10,000 USDC**

The total rewards pool is shared by On-chain Earn and OKX Wallet. For each day
during the first three weeks, the total rewards will be distributed based on
the proportion of each user's deposit to the total pool of deposits in
Compound v3 (Ethereum).

**On-chain Earn highlights**

  * No subscription limits
  * Simplified and transparent subscription process 
  * Annualised rewards from on-chain protocol

**How to subscribe?**

  1. In [On-chain Earn](/en-eu/earn/onchain-earn), search USDC
  2. Select Compound v3 (Ethereum)

**Disclaimer**

  1. Regarding On-chain Earn products, as the Defi mechanisms for different projects may vary, it's important to carefully read and understand the mechanism rules for each project before subscribing. These rules include, but aren't limited to the lock up mechanis and period, minimum redemption amount, rewards accrual start time, reward distribution time, principal redemption period, and expected annualized earnings. 
  2. OKX will charge a certain percentage of fees from users. For detailed fee information, please refer to the product introduction page.
  3. OKX assumes no responsibility for disputes over any hacking incidents, project fraud, and other risks that may result in asset loss for the subscribers.

Thank you for your continued support. We'll be launching more On-chain Earn
products in the coming weeks. Stay tuned for more information.

OKX team  
October 21, 2024

title: Exclusive ZETA campaigns to earn extra rewards
body:
OKX is launching another round of ZETA campaigns – ZetaChain Learn & Earn and
ZETA airdrop – on August 8, 2024, at 6:00 am UTC, to provide you with a deeper
knowledge of the ZetaChain network, and for you to earn extra ZETA rewards.

###  
 **About ZetaChain Learn & Earn**

 **Eligibility**

  * First-timer on ZetaChain Learn & Earn

  * Complete identity verification

  * Complete all 4 required tasks within the campaign period to be eligible to receive rewards on a first-come, first-served basis

  
 **How to participate?**

The campaign is only available on the OKX app.

Note: Using a sub-account to participate in the campaign is ineligible.

  
 **Campaign tasks**

  1. Take a quiz: Answer 5 questions to test your ZetaChain knowledge based on the introductions.

  2. Stake ZETA: Make a minimum subscription of 10 ZETA on On-chain Earn.

  
 **Notes**

  * You must complete all required Learn & Earn campaign tasks in order to be eligible to earn the campaign rewards.

  * The campaign rewards are limited and will be distributed on a first-come, first-served basis. Therefore, please note that it’s not guaranteed for you to receive the rewards even if you’ve completed all the required tasks.

  
 **Campaign details**

 **Campaign period**

|

 **Prize pool**

|

 **Rewards amount**  
  
---|---|---  
  
August 8, 2024, 6:00 am UTC – September 15, 2024, 6:00 am UTC

|

120,000 ZETA

|

8 ZETA  
  
  
 **Rewards distribution**

  * Rewards are limited and are based on a first-come, first-served basis.

  * Rewards are only allocated to the first 15,000 eligible users, which will be distributed after the campaign ends.

  * If you’re one of the 15,000 eligible users, your rewards of 8 ZETA will be distributed to your funding account within 30 days after the campaign ends.

###  **About ZETA airdrop**

 **Eligibility**

  * Complete identity verification

  * Stake at least 10 ZETA to be eligible to receive airdrop rewards  

 **How to participate?**

The campaign is available on the OKX app and web.

Note: Using a sub-account to participate in the campaign is ineligible.  

 **Rules**

  * Before the campaign starts, we’ll take a snapshot of your ZETA On-chain Earn subscriptions on **August 8, 2024 at 6:00 am UTC**. This snapshot will determine your baseline holdings.

  * We’ll take daily snapshots at 6:00 am UTC of your On-chain Earn subscriptions during the campaign period. The average increased subscription amount from the baseline snapshot, or “average increment” will determine the size of your rewards. 

  
**Campaign details**

 **Campaign period**

|

 **Prize pool**

|

 **Rewards amount**  
  
---|---|---  
  
August 8, 2024, 6:00 am UTC – September 15, 2024, 6:00 am UTC

|

120,000 ZETA

|

Depending on your staking amount  
  
 **Rewards distribution**

  * Your airdrop rewards = (Your average increment / Total average increment) × Prize pool

  * Example (for illustrative purposes only):

    * User A has 5 ZETA staked during the initial snapshot taken on August 8.

    * He stakes 5 ZETA on the first day of the 14-day campaign, giving him a total of 10 ZETA.

    * He stakes another 5 ZETA on day 7 of the campaign, giving him a total of 15 ZETA. He does nothing else for the remainder of the campaign.

    * User A's average increment is calculated as follows:

      * (10 + 10 + 10 + 10 + 10 + 10 + 10 + 15 + 15 + 15 + 15 + 15 + 15 + 15) / 14 - 5 = 7.5 ZETA

    * Assuming that the total average increment of users participating in the campaign is 1,000 ZETA, and the prize pool is 10,000 ZETA. User A's airdrop rewards will be calculated as follows:

      * User A's airdrop rewards = (7.5 ZETA / 1,000 ZETA) × 10,000 ZETA = 75 ZETA

  
 **Terms & Conditions**

  1. The " ZetaChain Learn & Earn Campaign" & "ZETA Airdrop" promotions start at **6:00 am UTC on August 8, 2024** , **** and end at **6:00 am UTC on September 15, 2024.** (the "Promotion Period").

  3. Participation in this campaign is restricted to the main account only. Sub-accounts are not eligible to participate. The earnings of sub-accounts will not be included in the calculation of the earnings of the main account.

  6. For Learn & Earn - only users that have completed all of the following (1) Click on the join now button; (2) Read 5 short introductions about ZetaChain. You can revisit the learning materials during the campaign period. (3) take part in the quiz within the Promotion Period; (4) Stake a minimum of 30 ZETA to the user's OKX account on the ZetaChain network; and (5) complete Identity verification, and you are eligible for the rewards. The ZetaChain Learn and Earn promotion rewards shall be limited to the first 15,000 qualified participating users.

  7.  **Rewards will be distributed within thirty (30) days from September 15, 2024, 23:59 UTC.** The platform has the right to postpone the issuance of rewards for any reason it deems necessary in its discretion, such as large-scale risk control checks and other issues.

title: OKX to change discount rate rules for flexible loan users
body:
To ensure platform safety and improve precision in risk measurement, OKX will
adjust the discount rates for all [Flexible Loan](/en-eu/loan) users.

The adjustment will take place from **8:00 am UTC on August 22, 2024 to 8:00
am UTC on September 22, 2024**. After the adjustment, the discount tiers will
be based on crypto amounts, with each crypto assigned to its own tiers.

The specific adjustments can be found [here](/en-eu/help/okx-to-change-
discount-rate-rules-in-multi-currency-and-portfolio-margin).

title: Stake ZETA to enjoy airdrop rewards from a 10,000 ZETA prize pool
body:
OKX is launching an exclusive airdrop campaign for ZETA On-chain Earn users on
**June 25, 2024 at 6:00 am UTC.**  

 **Campaign details**

 **1\. Eligibility**

  * Complete identity verification

  * Stake at least 1 ZETA to be eligible to receive airdrop rewards

 **2\. Rules**

  * Before the campaign starts, we'll take a snapshot of your ZETA On-chain Earn subscriptions on **June 25, 2024** at 6:00 am UTC. This snapshot will determine your baseline holdings.

  * We'll take daily snapshots at 6:00 am UTC of your On-chain Earn subscriptions during the campaign period. The average increased subscription amount from the baseline snapshot, or "average increment" will determine the size of your rewards. This means you should stake as much as possible as early as possible during the campaign period to maximize your rewards.

  
 **3\. Reward calculations**

  * Your airdrop rewards = (Your average increment / Total average increment) × Prize pool

  * Example (for illustrative purposes only):

    * User A has 5 ZETA staked during the initial snapshot taken on June 25.

    * He stakes 5 ZETA on the first day of the 14-day campaign, giving him a total of 10 ZETA.

    * He stakes another 5 ZETA on day 7 of the campaign, giving him a total of 15 ZETA. He does nothing else for the remainder of the campaign.

    * User A's average increment is calculated as follows:

      * (10 + 10 + 10 + 10 + 10 + 10 + 10 + 15 + 15 + 15 + 15 + 15 + 15 + 15) / 14 - 5 = 7.5 ZETA

    * Assuming that the total average increment of users participating in the campaign is 1,000 ZETA, and the prize pool is 10,000 ZETA. User A's airdrop rewards will be calculated as follows:

      * User A's airdrop rewards = (7.5 ZETA / 1,000 ZETA) × 10,000 ZETA = 75 ZETA

  
 **4\. Schedule and prize details**

 **Campaign period**

|

 **Prize pool**

|

 **Reward token**  
  
---|---|---  
  
June 25, 2024, 6:00 am UTC - July 9, 2024, 6:00 am UTC

|

10,000 ZETA

|

ZETA  
  
  
 **5\. Reward distribution**

  * You'll receive your airdrop rewards within 7 working days after the campaign period ends.

  * All On-chain Earn staking interest will be distributed to your funding account depending on each token's on-chain mechanism.

  * OKX has the discretion to convert any rewards into platform vouchers or USDT of equivalent value or less value. This may happen in cases where platform restrictions in certain jurisdictions cause participants to be ineligible for certain campaign rewards, where OKX is unable to procure the prizes for the participants, or in any case that OKX deems in its full discretion that it's necessary for the rewards to be converted.

  
 **Disclaimer**

  * OKX and collaborated third-party providers provide node setup, operation, and maintenance services for On-chain Earn product staking, and bear all related costs. On-chain Earn product staking rewards are subject to fluctuations, and will be distributed based on on-chain conditions.

  * Participation with sub-accounts is forbidden.

  
 **Terms & Conditions**

  1. By default, users who enter the campaign page and participate in this campaign have read and understood the Terms & Conditions of this campaign.

  2. Participation in this campaign is restricted to the main account only. Sub-accounts are not eligible to participate. The earnings of sub-accounts will not be included in the calculation of the earnings of the main account.

  3. According to local laws and regulations, users from the following countries or regions (subject to verification information) may not be eligible to participate in this campaign: please refer to clause 2.2 of OKX's [Terms of Use](/en-eu/help-center/360021813691).

Digital assets are speculative and highly volatile, can become illiquid at any time, and are for investors with a high-risk tolerance. Investors in digital assets could lose the entire value of their investment.

  5. Please note that the value of prizes may fluctuate. Due to such price fluctuations, the value of your prize may increase or decrease in value at any given moment. OKX is not responsible for fluctuations in the value of prizes due to market fluctuations. All applicable taxes, costs, and additional expenses associated with the acceptance and use of the prize are the sole responsibility of the campaign prize recipient.

  6. Any and all applicable taxes and all fees and additional expenses, including connection, installation, and/or service costs, related to acceptance and use of the reward are the sole responsibility of the individual reward recipient.

  7. During the campaign period, OKX will closely track the behaviour of traders to avoid any form of cheating or abnormal behaviour, including but not limited to: registering multiple accounts, using other people's accounts, using other people's information to register accounts, false identity information, maliciously increasing trading data, engaging in laundering trades or wash trades, violating the terms and conditions of the campaign, violating local regulatory rules for transaction and any other campaigns related to illegal, fraudulent or harmful purposes. If any of the above acts are deemed to be discovered by OKX, OKX reserves the right to disqualify the user from the prize.

body:
OKX is launching an exclusive Aptos Learn & Earn campaign on May 17, 2024 at
11:00 am UTC.

  
 **About Aptos Learn & Earn campaign Eligibility**

  * Complete identity verification

  * Complete all 4 required tasks within the campaign period to be eligible to receive rewards on a first-come, first-served basis

  
 **How to participate?**

The campaign is only available on the OKX app.

Note: Using a sub-account to participate in the campaign is ineligible

  
 **Campaign tasks**

  1. Learn about Aptos: Read 5 short introductions about Aptos. You can revisit the learning materials during the campaign period.

  2. Take a quiz: Answer 5 questions to test your Aptos knowledge based on the introductions.

  3. Stake APT: Make a minimum subscription of 1 APT on On-chain Earn

  4. Hold APT for 7 days: Maintain a minimum net increment of 1 APT for 7 consecutive days

  
 **Campaign rules**

  * You must complete all required Learn & Earn campaign tasks in order to be eligible to earn the campaign rewards.

  * The campaign rewards are limited and will be distributed on a first come, first served basis. Therefore, please note that it's not guaranteed for you to receive the rewards even if you've completed all the required tasks.

  * Note: The event ends early when the quota is full.

|

 **Rewards distribution**

title: Stake SUI to enjoy airdrop rewards from a 10,000 SUI prize pool
body:
OKX is launching an exclusive airdrop campaign for SUI On-chain Earn users on
**April 19, 2024 at 6:00 am UTC.**  
  
 **Campaign details**

 **1\. Eligibility**

  * Complete identity verification

  * Stake at least 1 SUI to be eligible to receive airdrop rewards

 **2\. Rules**

  * Before the campaign starts, we'll take a snapshot of your SUI On-chain Earn subscriptions on **April 19, 2024** at 6:00 am UTC. This snapshot will determine your baseline holdings.

  * We'll take daily snapshots at 6:00 am UTC of your On-chain Earn subscriptions during the campaign period. The average increased subscription amount from the baseline snapshot, or "average increment" will determine the size of your rewards. This means you should stake as much as possible as early as possible during the campaign period to maximize your rewards.

  
 **3\. Reward calculations**

  * Your airdrop rewards = (Your average increment / Total average increment) × Prize pool

  * Example (for illustrative purposes only):

    * User A has 5 SUI staked during the initial snapshot taken on April 19.

    * He stakes 5 SUI on the first day of the 14-day campaign, giving him a total of 10 SUI.

    * He stakes another 5 SUI on day 7 of the campaign, giving him a total of 15 SUI. He does nothing else for the remainder of the campaign.

    * User A's average increment is calculated as follows:

      * (10 + 10 + 10 + 10 + 10 + 10 + 10 + 15 + 15 + 15 + 15 + 15 + 15 + 15) / 14 - 5 = 7.5 SUI

    * Assuming that the total average increment of users participating in the campaign is 1,000 SUI, and the prize pool is 10,000 SUI. User A's airdrop rewards will be calculated as follows:

      * User A's airdrop rewards = (7.5 SUI / 1,000 SUI) × (10,000 SUI) = 75 SUI

 **4\. Schedule and prize details**

 **Campaign period**

|

 **Prize pool**

|

 **Reward token**  
  
---|---|---  
  
April 19, 2024, 6:00 am UTC - April 26, 2024, 6:00 am UTC

|

10,000 SUI

|

SUI  
  
 **5\. Reward distribution**

  * You'll receive your airdrop rewards within 7 working days after the campaign period ends.

  * All On-chain Earn staking interest will be distributed to your funding account depending on each token's on-chain mechanism.

  * OKX has the discretion to convert any rewards into platform vouchers or USDT of equivalent value or less value. This may happen in cases where platform restrictions in certain jurisdictions cause participants to be ineligible for certain campaign rewards, where OKX is unable to procure the prizes for the participants, or in any case that OKX deems in its full discretion that it's necessary for the rewards to be converted.

  
 **Disclaimer**

  * OKX and collaborated third-party providers provide node setup, operation, and maintenance services for On-chain Earn product staking, and bear all related costs. On-chain Earn product staking rewards are subject to fluctuations, and will be distributed based on on-chain conditions.

  * Participation with sub-accounts is forbidden.

 **Terms & Conditions**

1\. By default, users who enter the campaign page and participate in this
campaign have read and understood the Terms & Conditions of this campaign.  
2\. Participation in this campaign is restricted to the main account only.
Sub-accounts are not eligible to participate. The earnings of sub-accounts
will not be included in the calculation of the earnings of the main account.  
3\. According to local laws and regulations, users from the following
countries or regions (subject to verification information) may not be eligible
to participate in this campaign: please refer to clause 2.2 of [OKX's Terms of
Use](/en-eu/help/terms-of-service).  
4\. This campaign does not constitute or shall not be considered as a
recommendation to deal in any products or investment advice. Digital assets
are speculative and highly volatile, can become illiquid at any time, and are
for investors with a high-risk tolerance. Investors in digital assets could
lose the entire value of their investment.  
5\. Please note that the value of prizes may fluctuate. Due to such price
fluctuations, the value of your prize may increase or decrease in value at any
given moment. OKX is not responsible for fluctuations in the value of prizes
due to market fluctuations. All applicable taxes, costs, and additional
expenses associated with the acceptance and use of the prize are the sole
responsibility of the campaign prize recipient.  
6\. Any and all applicable taxes and all fees and additional expenses,
including connection, installation, and/or service costs, related to
acceptance and use of the reward are the sole responsibility of the individual
reward recipient.  
7\. During the campaign period, OKX will closely track the behaviour of
traders to avoid any form of cheating or abnormal behaviour, including but not
limited to: registering multiple accounts, using other people's accounts,
using other people's information to register accounts, false identity
information, maliciously increasing trading data, engaging in laundering
trades or wash trades, violating the terms and conditions of the campaign,
violating local regulatory rules for transaction and any other campaigns
related to illegal, fraudulent or harmful purposes. If any of the above acts
are deemed to be discovered by OKX, OKX reserves the right to disqualify the
user from the prize.  
8\. Notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein, OKX reserves the right to
exclude any participant from participating in this campaign without notice.  
9\. Risk warning: Digital asset prices are subject to high market risk and
price volatility. The value of your investment may fluctuate and you may lose
the amount invested. You are solely responsible for your investment decisions
and OKX is not liable for any losses that may arise. Past performance also
does not constitute a reliable predictor of future performance. You should
only invest in products that you are familiar with and understand the risks
involved. You should consider your own investment experience, financial
situation, investment objectives and risk appetite and consult an independent
financial adviser before making any investment. This document should not be
regarded as financial advice. Please refer to the [OKX Terms of Use](/en-
eu/help/terms-of-service) and [Risk Warning](/en-eu/help/risk-compliance-
disclosure) for further details.  
10\. The value of digital assets, including but not limited to stablecoins,
can and do fluctuate greatly from time to time. The value of any reward under
this campaign at the time a participant qualifies for such reward may not be
equal to the value of such reward at the time of distribution to the
participant. Due to such fluctuations, users may experience a significant
increase or decrease in the value of their assets at any given moment.  
11\. OKX reserves the right to determine and amend the rules of the campaign
at any time without further notice, including but not limited to cancelling,
extending or terminating this campaign, modifying the eligibility conditions
for users participating in the campaign, and adjusting the campaign and Reward
rules. All participants shall be bound by these revised terms.  
12\. OKX reserves the right of final interpretation of this promotion. Please
contact the customer service team if you have any questions.  
13\. OKX has always taken its compliance obligations seriously and has always
complied with the requirements of local regulators. We ask that you comply
with the relevant laws and regulations of your country or region.  
14\. OKX is not responsible for technical, graphic, typographical or editorial

title: Starknet (STRK) airdrop rules for eligible ETH stakers
body:
OKX has successfully distributed the Starknet (STRK) airdrop tokens to users
who participated in ETH staking through OKX before the ETH merge. The
airdropped tokens will be directly deposited into your funding account without
further need for claiming.

#### Airdrop rules

Snapshot requirement: Users with BETH in their accounts at snapshot time, that
is to say at 6:43 am UTC on September 15, 2022, are eligible for the airdrop.  
Distribution rules: The total airdrop allocation is 626,040 STRK tokens. OKX
will distribute the airdrop tokens to eligible users based on the ratio of 1
BETH = 10.55515 STRK.

#### Please note:

If your account falls under any of the following circumstances, you will not
be eligible for the airdrop:

  1. Your account has not completed identity verification.
  2. According to local laws and regulations, users from the following countries or regions (based on identity verification information) are not eligible for this airdrop: Hong Kong, Belgium, Cuba, France, Iran, Japan, North Korea, Crimea, Malaysia, Singapore, Syria, the United States, including all U.S. territories such as Puerto Rico, American Samoa, Guam, Northern Mariana Islands, and U.S. Virgin Islands (St. Croix, St. John, and St. Thomas), Bahamas, Canada, Netherlands, United Kingdom, Ireland, Bangladesh, Bolivia, Donetsk, Luhansk, and Malta.
  3. If your account is currently inactive or frozen.  
If you have not completed identity verification, or your account status is
inactive or frozen, please complete identity verification or have your account
status updated by 12:00 pm UTC on March 25, 2024. OKX will conduct another
round of airdrop for eligible users at that time. OKX will no longer provide
support for this airdrop beyond this deadline.

OKX Team  
February 22, 2024

  * Simplified operational steps resulting in a more fluid user experience
  * Real on-chain annualized earnings

Details of the products can be found in the table below.

Product | Category | Stake | Receive | Product quota | Individual quota | Min.
staking amount | Redemption time | Reward distribution  
---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---  
On-chain Earn | Staking | APT | APT | N/A | N/A | 1 APT |  1-30 Days | 1-30
Days  
  
To stake APT on [On-chain Earn](/en-eu/earn/onchain-earn#from=announcement),
follow the instructions below:  
On browser: Navigation bar > Grow > Earn > [On-chain Earn](/en-
eu/earn/onchain-earn#from=announcement), choose APT and select subscribe  
On the OKX app: Grow > Earn > On-chain Earn, choose APT and select subscribe

### Product Mechanism

#### Earnings and subscription:

  * If you subscribe before 03:00 (UTC) daily:
    * Your APT will be on-chain and start accruing interest at 03:00 on the same day. Reward distribution time depends on the monthly epoch, which is set by the Aptos network and is dynamic. Therefore, it could take anywhere between 1-30 days to receive rewards, which will be sent to your funding account.
  * If you subscribe after 03:00 (UTC) daily:
    * Your APT will be on-chain and start accruing interest at 03:00 on the same day. Reward distribution time depends on the monthly epoch, which is set by the Aptos Network and is dynamic. Therefore, it could take anywhere between 1-30 days to receive rewards, which will be sent to your funding account.

#### Redemption:

  1. Redemption requests can be submitted at any time. Redemption takes anywhere from 1-30 days, based on the time between your redemption time and the time of the Aptos Network's epoch. Afterwards, your APT will be redeemed from the chain and distributed to your funding account. There are no rewards during the redemption period.
  2. If you redeem the principal before the reward distribution date, OKX will calculate rewards based on the actual number of days staked and distribute them to your funding account on the reward distribution day.

#### Disclaimer

  1. As Proof-of-Stake (PoS) mechanisms vary for different tokens, it's important to fully understand the rules and details of each project before subscribing. These include, but aren't limited to minimum redemption amounts, interest accrual start times, reward distribution times, redemption periods, and expected annualized earnings. 
  2. OKX will charge a 7% service fee for APT staking. For more detailed fee information, please refer to the respective tokens' product introduction pages.
  3. Aside from project launch and reward distribution, OKX assumes no responsibility for disputes over any disagreements, hacking incidents, project fraud, and other risks that may result in asset loss for subscribers.

Thank you for your continued support. We'll be launching more On-chain Earn
products in the coming weeks. Stay tuned for more information.

OKX team  
Jan 11, 2024

title: Exclusive On-chain earn airdrop: Stake SOL, DOT, MATIC and TRX for free rewards
body:
OKX is launching an exclusive airdrop campaign for SOL, DOT, MATIC and TRX
Onchain Earn products users on **January 11, 2024 at 12:00 am UTC**.

**Campaign details**  
 **1\. Eligibility**

  * Campaign period: January 11, 2024 at 12:00 (UTC) to January 25, 2024 at 12:00 (UTC).
  * Users must stake the airdrop tokens in the following amounts to receive any rewards：
    * SOL: at least 1 SOL
    * DOT: at least 2 DOT
    * MATIC: at least 1 MATIC
    * TRX: at least 20 TRX

**2\. Rules**

  * Before the campaign starts, we'll take a snapshot of your SOL, DOT, MATIC, and TRX On-chain Earn subscriptions on January 11, 2024 at 06:00 (UTC). This snapshot will determine your baseline holdings.
  * We'll take daily snapshots (taken at 12:00 UTC) of your On-chain Earn subscriptions during the campaign period. The average increased subscription amount from the baseline snapshot, or "average increment" will determine the size of your rewards. This means you must stake as much as possible as early as possible during the campaign period to maximize your rewards.

**3\. Reward calculations**

  * Your airdrop reward = (Your average increment) / (Total average increment) × (Prize pool)
  * Example (for illustrative purposes only):
    * User A has 5 SOL staked during the initial snapshot taken on January 11.
    * He stakes 5 SOL on the first day of the 14-day campaign, giving him a total of 10 SOL.
    * He stakes another 5 SOL on day 7 of the campaign, giving him a total of 15 SOL. He does nothing else for the remainder of the campaign.
    * User A's average increment is calculated as follows:
      * (10 + 10 + 10 + 10 + 10 + 10 + 10 + 15 + 15 + 15 + 15 + 15 + 15 + 15) / 14 - 5 = 7.5 SOL.
    * Assuming that the total average increment of users participating in the campaign is 1,000 SOL, and the prize pool is 10,000 SOL, user A's airdrop rewards will be calculated as follows:
      * User A's airdrop rewards = (7.5 SOL) / (1,000 SOL) × (10,000 SOL) = 75 SOL

**4\. Schedule and prize details**

Campaign period | Prize pool | Token  
---|---|---  
January 11, 2024 at 12:00 (UTC) - January 25, 2024 at 12:00 (UTC) | 250 SOL |
SOL  
January 11, 2024 at 12:00 (UTC) - January 25, 2024 at 12:00 (UTC) | 14,000
MATIC | MATIC  
January 11, 2024 at 12:00 (UTC) - January 25, 2024 at 12:00 (UTC) | 2,000 DOT
| DOT  
January 11, 2024 at 12:00 (UTC) - January 25, 2024 at 12:00 (UTC) | 250,000
TRX | TRX  
  
**5\. Reward distribution**

  * You'll receive your airdrop rewards within 15 working days in the form of a free On-chain Earn subscription after the campaign period ends. The prize will be labeled "airdrop reward". 
  * All On-chain Earn staking interest will be distributed to your funding account depending on each token's on-chain mechanism.
  * OKX has the discretion to convert any rewards into platform vouchers or USDT of equivalent value or less value. This may happen in cases where platform restrictions in certain jurisdictions cause participants to be ineligible for certain campaign rewards, where OKX is unable to procure the prizes for the participants, or in any case that OKX deems in its full discretion that it's necessary for the rewards to be converted.

**Disclaimer:**

  * OKX and collaborated third-party providers provide node setup, operation, and maintenance services for On-chain Earn product staking, and bear all related costs. On-chain Earn product staking rewards are subject to fluctuations, and will be distributed based on ‌on-chain conditions.
  * Participation with sub-accounts is forbidden.

**Terms and conditions:**

  1. By default, users who enter the campaign page and participate in this campaign have read and understood the Terms and Conditions of this campaign.
  2. Participation in this campaign is restricted to the main account only. Sub-accounts are not eligible to participate. The earnings of sub-accounts will not be included in the calculation of the earnings of the main account.
  3. According to local laws and regulations, users from the following countries or regions (subject to verification information) are not eligible to participate in this campaign: Hong Kong, Belgium, Cuba, France, Iran, Japan, North Korea, Crimea, Malaysia, Singapore, Syria, United States of America including all U.S.A. territories like Puerto Rico, American Samoa, Guam, Northern Mariana Island, and the US Virgin Islands (St. Croix, St. John and St. Thomas), the Bahamas, Canada, the Netherlands, the United Kingdom, Ireland, Bangladesh, Bolivia, Donetsk, Luhansk and Malta.
  4. This campaign does not constitute or shall not be considered as a recommendation to deal in any products, or investment advice. Digital assets are speculative and highly volatile, can become illiquid at any time, and are for investors with a high-risk tolerance. Investors in digital assets could lose the entire value of their investment.
  5. Please note that the value of prizes may fluctuate. Due to such price fluctuations, the value of your prize may increase or decrease in value at any given moment. OKX is not responsible for fluctuations in the value of prizes due to market fluctuations. All applicable taxes, costs, and additional expenses associated with the acceptance and use of the prize are the sole responsibility of the campaign prize recipient.
  6. Any and all applicable taxes and all fees and additional expenses, including connection, installation, and/or service costs, related to acceptance and use of the reward are the sole responsibility of the individual reward recipient.
  7. During the campaign period, OKX will closely track the behaviour of traders to avoid any form of cheating or abnormal behaviour, including but not limited to: registering multiple accounts, using other people's accounts, using other people's information to register accounts, false KYC information, maliciously increasing trading data, engaging in laundering trades or wash trades, violating the terms and conditions of the campaign, violating local regulatory rules for transaction and any other campaigns related to illegal, fraudulent or harmful purposes. If any of the above acts are deemed to be discovered by OKX, OKX reserves the right to disqualify the user from the prize.
  8. Notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein, OKX reserves the right to exclude any participant from participating in this campaign without notice.
  9. Risk warning: Digital asset prices are subject to high market risk and price volatility. The value of your investment may fluctuate and you may lose the amount invested. You are solely responsible for your investment decisions and OKX is not liable for any losses that may arise. Past performance also does not constitute a reliable predictor of future performance. You should only invest in products that you are familiar with and understand the risks involved. You should consider your own investment experience, financial situation, investment objectives and risk appetite and consult an independent financial adviser before making any investment. This document should not be regarded as financial advice. Please refer to the [OKX Terms of Use](/en-eu/help/terms-of-service) and [Risk Warning](/en-eu/help/risk-compliance-disclosure) for further details.
  10. The value of digital assets, including but not limited to stablecoins, can and do fluctuate greatly from time to time. The value of any reward under this Campaign at the time a participant qualifies for such reward may not be equal to the value of such reward at the time of distribution to the participant. Due to such fluctuations, users may experience a significant increase or decrease in the value of their assets at any given moment.
  11. OKX reserves the right to determine and amend the rules of the campaign at any time without further notice, including but not limited to cancelling, extending or terminating this campaign, modifying the eligibility conditions for users participating in the campaign, and adjusting the campaign and Reward rules. All participants shall be bound by these revised terms.
  12. OKX reserves the right of final interpretation of this promotion. Please contact the customer service team if you have any questions.
  13. OKX has always taken its compliance obligations seriously and has always complied with the requirements of local regulators. We ask that you comply with the relevant laws and regulations of your country or region.

January 11, 2024

Jumpstart Mining, which are calculated in real-time and can be withdrawn at
any time.

2\. Users' per minute rewards = The amount of their staked token / Total
amount of staked token * The amount of tokens released per minute.

If a user has staked 0.1 BTC/ETH, the total amount of BTC/ETH staked at that
time is 1,000, and the amount of tokens released per minute is 10,000, then
the user's per-minute rewards would be calculated as follows:

User's per minute rewards = (0.1 / 1,000) * 10,000 = 1 (token).

title: OKX will introduce sub-account rate limit
body:
In order to provide a stable exchange platform, the exchange will impose a
order rate limit at the sub-account level, allowing a maximum of 1000 order
requests per 2 seconds. Only new order requests and amendment order requests
will be counted towards this limit. For batch order requests consisting of
multiple orders, each order will be counted individually. The existing rate
limit rule per instrument ID remains unchanged and the existing rate limit and
sub-account rate limit will operate in parallel. If clients require a higher
rate limit, clients can trade via multiple sub-accounts.

As an incentive for more efficient trading, the exchange will offer a higher
sub-account rate limit to clients with account level >= VIP5 with a high trade
fill ratio. The ratio is determined by the trade volume and the number of
place and amend order requests.

For more details, please refer to

  * [Sub-account rate limit](/docs-v5/log_en#upcoming-changes-sub-account-rate-limit)
  * [Fill ratio based sub-account rate limit](/docs-v5/log_en#upcoming-changes-fill-ratio-based-sub-account-rate-limit)

The target go live date is early March. Any upcoming updates, including the
exact go live date, will be updated through this article.

OKX team  
January 10, 2024

title: Announcement on the Price Volatility of MANTRA (OM)
body:
We've recently observed significant volatility in the MANTRA (OM) token.
Following a sharp rise in its price beginning in early November 2024, the
token experienced an initial sudden and substantial price decline of more than
80% across the market at approximately 2:28:32am (UTC+8) on April 14, 2025 ("
**Market Event** "). We observed that substantial trading volume spikes and
price decline initially happened across various centralised exchanges outside
of OKX, before spreading to the overall market.

Following the incident, we have conducted investigations and identified major
changes to the MANTRA token’s tokenomics model since Oct 2024, based on both
publicly available on-chain data and internal exchange data. Our investigation
also uncovered that several on-chain addresses have been executing potentially
coordinated large-scale deposits and withdrawals across various centralized
exchanges since Mar 2025.

In light of the above-mentioned market risks, we have adjusted a number of
platform risk control parameters to mitigate potential impacts. We'd also like
to remind users that the current market environment involves heightened risk.
Certain tokens may experience significant changes in supply, which could
result in considerable price volatility. Users are advised to conduct thorough
due diligence and exercise caution when engaging in trading activities.

A risk warning has been added to the OM token page to inform users of its
increased volatility.

We'll continue to closely monitor this situation and implement appropriate
risk management measures to safeguard user interests and uphold platform
stability. We sincerely appreciate your continued support and trust in OKX.  

OKX Team  
April 14, 2025

title: AVAX bonus rewards for AAVE v3 (AVAX) USDT and USDC On-chain Earn
body:
From April 11 to June 6, 2025, OKX will offer AVAX bonus rewards for AAVE v3
USDT and USDC On-chain Earn. This will let users get more out of their
subscription without additional hassle.

 **About AAVE v3 AVAX bonus rewards**

We'll be distributing AVAX bonus rewards to your OKX Wallet based on your
portion of the total subscription. All users will share from pools of bonus
rewards, which are 4,400 AVAX for USDT and 3,600 AVAX for USDC.

When you subscribe to AAVE v3 USDT and USDC On-chain Earn, these are the
rewards you'll receive and their distribution rules:

  * USDT/USDC rewards: You'll earn rewards in your subscription crypto, which will be distributed when you redeem your principal.

  * AVAX rewards: The protocol's asAVAX rewards will be unwrapped to AVAX and distributed to you every 15 to 17 days.

  * AVAX bonus rewards: During the event, bonus rewards will be distributed to your funding account daily.

 **Highlights of On-chain Earn**

  * No subscription limits

  * Simplified operational steps resulting in a more fluid user experience

  * Real on-chain annualized earnings

 **How do I subscribe?**

  1. Visit the Grow page and select On-chain Earn.

  2. Choose to subscribe in USDT or USDC.

  3. Under "Source of earnings", select AAVE v3 (AVAX).

  4. Enter your subscription amount and confirm.

[Go to On-chain Earn](/en-eu/earn/onchain-earn#from=announcement)

* * *

  
 **Disclaimer**

  1. Regarding On-chain Earn products, as the Defi mechanisms for different projects may vary, it's important to carefully read and understand the mechanism rules for each project before subscribing. These rules include, but aren't limited to the minimum redemption amount, rewards accrual start time, reward distribution time, principal redemption period, and expected annualized earnings.

  2. OKX will extract a certain percentage of fees from users. For detailed fee information, please refer to the product introduction page.

  3. Except for project launch and reward distribution, OKX assumes no responsibility for disputes over any agreement, hacking incidents, project fraud, and other risks that may result in asset loss for the users.

Thank you for your continued support. We'll be launching more On-chain Earn
products in the future. Stay tuned for more information.  

OKX team

April 11, 2025

title: OKX to support FTM token migration
body:
According to the [_**official p**_](https://polygon.technology/blog/save-the-
date-matic-pol-migration-coming-september-4th-everything-you-need-to-know)[ _
**lan of Fantom**_](https://docs.soniclabs.com/migration/overview), the Fantom
(FTM) token will be undergoing a token migration and will be upgraded to Sonic
(S).

OKX will support FTM migration to S as per the following schedule:

 **1\. Deposits and withdrawals**

  * FTM deposits and withdrawals will be suspended at 3:30 am UTC on January 13, 2025, and deposits will no longer be supported after the token migration is complete.

  * The schedule for S deposits and withdrawals will be announced separately.

 **2\. Trading instruments**

 **Spot trading**

OKX will delist FTM/USDC and FTM/EUR spot trading pairs and terminate any
related orders between 3:00 am and 3:30 am UTC on January 13, 2025. All other
trading services (such as Convert, P2P Express, Copy trading, and Trading
bots) will also be suspended.

Please cancel all orders before 3:00 am UTC on January 13, 2025. Our system
will cancel any outstanding orders after this time.

 **At the time of delisting, orders placed by trading bots for the above-
mentioned pairs will be canceled, and bots will be stopped. Any related pairs
or positions will be sold or closed at the market price at that time.**

 ****

 **3\. Token migration**

  * At 4:00 pm UTC on January 13, 2025, an account snapshot on the user’s funding account will be performed, and the user’s FTM holdings will be converted into S at a 1:1 ratio. A separate announcement will be made once the migration is complete. Related assets in the trading account will be transferred to the funding account for the snapshot.

  * At the time of the snapshot, any FTM tokens that are being withdrawn or yet to be deposited successfully will not be included in the migration.

  * Holdings under 1 FTM will not be included in the migration.

  * The token migration is expected to take 1 - 5 days. During this period, your FTM valuation will be unavailable. Once the migration is complete, all your FTM will be converted to S, and FTM will no longer be shown in your asset list. (Note: Due to the large number of FTM holders, the migration time will be longer, and the announcement will be made immediately after the migration.)

title: OKX has completed distributing Pepper (PEPPER) airdrop
body:
We have completed the distribution of Pepper (PEPPER) token airdrops to users
who were holding CHZ at the stipulated snapshot time. Allocated tokens have
been deposited to your funding account automatically.

####  **Airdrop rules**

 **Snapshot time** :

  1. First snapshot time: 12:00 am UTC on October 10, 2024

  2. Second snapshot time: 12:00 am UTC on October 17, 2024

  3. Third snapshot time: 12:00 am UTC on October 24, 2024

 **Note** : The Chiliz team has [announced](https://www.chiliz.com/community-
token-pepper-brings-the-heat/) that the planned fourth airdrop snapshot had
been cancelled.

 **Snapshot scope** : funding account, trading account, and earn account

 **Snapshot rules** :

  1. The CHZ that was being withdrawn or not deposited successfully at snapshot time were not included.

  2. The snapshot amount was determined based on the CHZ equity balance of the account, and hence may have varied from the actual amount of tokens held based on your margin settings.

  3. Holdings under 100 CHZ (open orders excluded) were not included in the airdrop.

According to the official Chiliz token distribution settings, the airdrop
exchange rate was 150,000 PEPPER to 1 CHZ.  

####  **About trading the new token**

The new PEPPER token will have to go through OKX’s regular review process
before it can be traded on our platform. At the time of this announcement, OKX
**does not** support the spot trading of PEPPER. If this is supported in the
future, we will issue a separate announcement.

OKX team

November 5, 2024

title: OKX to support KLAY crypto migration
body:
According to the official plan of Klaytn, OKX will support KLAY crypto
migration to KAIA at a 1:1 ratio as per the following schedule:

  1. All pending orders for KLAY crypto will be canceled and the KLAY spot trading pairs KLAY/USDT, KLAY/USDC will be suspended between **8:00 am and 10:00 am UTC on October 28, 2024**. All other trading services (such as Convert, Copy trading, and Trading bots) will also be suspended.

  2. KLAY transfers, deposits, and withdrawals will be suspended at **10:00 am UTC on October 28, 2024**.

  3. An account snapshot will take place at **4:00 pm UTC on October 28, 2024**.

  4. The subsequent crypto migration will take place between **10:00 am UTC on October 29, 2024, and 10:00 am UTC on October 30, 2024.** Please note that OKX will strive to complete the crypto migration within the specified time frame. However, due to the need for coordination with the project team and other parties, there may be delays in the crypto migration process.

crypto KAIA deposits, withdrawals, and spot trading will open after crypto
migration. The specific opening times for these services will be announced
separately.

Please note:

  1. At the time of the snapshot, all the KLAY crypto that are being withdrawn or not deposited successfully will not be included in the migration.

  2. For KLAY crypto in the sub-account, once the migration is complete, the KAIA crypto will be sent to the main account.

  3. Holdings under 1 KLAY (open orders excluded) will not be included in the migration.

  4. The token migration is expected to take 3 - 5 days. During this period, your KLAY valuation will be unavailable. Once the migration is complete, all your KLAY will be converted to KAIA, and KLAY will no longer be shown in your asset list.

title: OKX to support Fast Redemption for On-chain Earn ETH, SOL & DOT Staking
body:
We are pleased to announce that fast redemption for On-chain Earn ETH, SOL &
DOT Staking will be enabled at 09:30 UTC on Sept 26, 2024, subject to our [On-
Chain Staking User Agreement](/en-eu/help/onchain-earn-user-agreement).  

 **Background**  
As on-chain redemption periods may vary, supporting fast redemption may help
users quickly access the funds. Fast redemption amounts are subject to a daily
limit.  

 **Daily Limit**

This limit is determined by a **fixed individual limit** and a **dynamic
platform limit**. The fast redemption amount is capped at the smaller of the
two limits. Amounts exceeding this limit will be redeemed with regular on-
chain redemption periods.

The **fixed individual limit** details are as follows:

  * ETH: 100

  * SOL: 240

  * DOT: 1300

The **dynamic platform limit** is set based on daily system liquidity.  

 **Disclaimer**

  1. On-chain Earn products are subject to the [On-Chain Earn User Agreement](/en-eu/help/onchain-earn-user-agreement). Some of the risks in using On-chain Earn products are described here. For a fuller description of the risks, please refer to the On-chain Earn User Agreement.

  2. Regarding On-chain Earn products, as the Staking mechanisms for different projects may vary, it's important to carefully read and understand the mechanism for each project before subscribing. These rules include, but aren't limited to, the minimum redemption amount, rewards accrual start time, reward distribution time, minimum lockup time before principal can be redeemed, and expected annualized earnings.

  3. OKX will charge a certain percentage of fees from users. For detailed fee information, please refer to the On-chain Earn product introduction page introduction page.

  4. OKX assumes no responsibility for disputes over any hacking incidents, fraud, and other risks that may result in asset loss for the users.

  
Thank you for your continued support. We'll be launching more On-chain Earn
products in the near feature. Stay tuned for more information.

  
OKX team

Sept 27, 2024

title: Türkiye’deki Kullanıcılarımız için Yeni Kripto Regülasyonu Kapsamında Hizmet Güncellemeleri | Service Updates Under New Crypto Regulation for Our Customers in Turkiye
body:
Değerli Müşterilerimiz,

  
OKX olarak, şeffaflık ve yerel yasa ve düzenlemelere uyum ilkemiz
doğrultusunda Türkiye’deki hizmetlerimizde yapılacak bazı önemli
değişiklikleri sizlerle paylaşmak istiyoruz. 2 Temmuz 2024 tarihinde Türkiye
Cumhuriyeti Resmî Gazetesi’nde yayımlanan yeni mevzuat uyarınca, OKX’in
hizmetlerinde gerçekleştirilecek aşağıdaki değişiklikleri sizlere bildirmek
isteriz:

  *  **Türkçe Dil Seçeneği:** Türkçe dil desteği www.okx.com websitesinden 29 Eylül 2024 tarihinde kaldırılacaktır.

  *  **Pazarlama Faaliyetleri:** www.okx.com websitesinde Türkiye’de yerleşik kullanıcılarımıza yönelik tanıtım ve pazarlama faaliyetlerimiz 1 Ekim 2024 **** itibariyle **** tamamen durdurulacaktır.

Geçerli yasa ve düzenlemelere uyum en büyük önceliğimizdir. OKX’in
(www.okx.com) kesintisiz hizmet vermeye devam edeceğinden emin olabilirsiniz.
Kripto varlık yatırma, çekme ve alım satım işlevlerimiz kullanıcılarımıza
erişilebilir kalacaktır.Bu geçiş sürecinde gösterdiğiniz anlayış ve desteğiniz
için teşekkür ederiz. Herhangi bir sorunuz ya da merak ettiğiniz bir konu
olması halinde, müşteri destek ekibimize 7/24 ulaşabilirsiniz. OKX TR’yi
sosyal medyadan takip ederek güncel gelişmelerden haberdar olabilirsiniz:
“[X](https://x.com/OKXTurkiye)”,“[Telegram](https://t.me/OKXTR)”.

 _Bu açıklama sadece bilgi amaçlıdır. Bu açıklama (i) herhangi yatırım
tavsiyesi veya yatırım önerisi, (ii) dijital varlıkların satın alınması, veya
satılmasına yönelik bir teklif ya da talep veya (iii) finans, muhasebe, hukuk
veya vergi ile ilgili tavsiye niteliği taşımamaktadır ve bu şekilde
değerlendirilmemelidir. Sabit coinler ve NFT’ler dâhil olmak üzere dijital
varlıklar piyasa oynaklığına tabidir, yüksek derecede risk içerir ve değer
kaybedebilir. Dijital varlıklarla al-sat yapmanın veya bu varlıklara sahip
olmanın sizin için uygun olup olmadığını, kendi finansal durumunuz ve risk
toleransınıza göre dikkatlice değerlendirmeniz gereklidir. Tüm ürünler tüm
bölgelerde sunulmayabilir. Kişisel durumunuz veya koşullarınıza ilişkin
sorularınız için lütfen kendi hukuk, vergi veya yatırım uzmanınıza danışın._

* * *

Dear Customers,

  
We would like to share with you some important changes to our services in
Turkiye in line with our principles of providing transparency and compliance
with local laws and regulations.  
In accordance with the new laws and regulations published in the Official
Gazette of the Republic of Turkiye on 2 July 2024, we would like to inform you
about the following changes to OKX's services:

  *  **Language Option:** Turkish language support will be removed from www.okx.com website on 29th September, 2024.

  *  **Marketing Activities:** From October 1, 2024, the www.okx.com website will completely cease promotional and marketing activities for our customers residing in Turkiye.

Compliance with applicable laws and regulations is our top priority. We assure
you that OKX ( www.okx.com ) will continue to provide services without
interruption. Our crypto asset deposit, withdrawal and trading functions will
remain accessible. Thank you for your understanding and support. If you have
any questions or concerns, you can contact our customer support team 24 / 7.
You can be informed about current developments by following OKX TR on social
media: ["X ](https://x.com/OKXTurkiye)" and "[Telegram](https://t.me/OKXTR)".

 _This announcement is provided for informational purposes only. It is not
intended to provide (i) investment advice or an investment recommendation;
(ii) an offer or solicitation to buy, sell, or hold digital assets; or (iii)
financial, accounting, legal, or tax advice. Digital asset holdings, including
stablecoins and NFTs, involve a high degree of risk and can fluctuate greatly.
You should carefully consider whether trading or holding digital assets is
suitable for you in light of your financial condition. Not all products are
available in all regions. Please consult your legal/tax/investment
professional for questions about your specific circumstances._

title: AAVE v3 (Avalanche) - USDT and USDC On-chain Earn product & additional AVAX rewards event launch announcement

  2. Rewards and distribution rules

    * Deposit rewards: Users earn rewards by depositing the base asset USDT/USDC into the protocol. The rewards will be disbursed when the user redeems the principal.

    * AVAX token bonus: The rewards will be distributed daily to the users' funding accounts during the event.

  
 **On-chain Earn highlights:**

  * Simplified operational steps resulting in a more fluid user experience

title: OKX to support EOS (EOS) mainnet upgrade
body:
We'll be supporting the EOS network’s mainnet upgrade.

  * We’ll suspend deposits and withdrawals of EOS tokens and tokens belonging to the network at 13:00 pm UTC on September 25, 2024.

  * The services will resume once the upgraded network is stable without further announcement.

  * If you hold any EOS and tokens belonging to the EOS network in your account, you don’t need to do anything during the upgrade period.

  

Please note:

  * Trading of EOS tokens and tokens belonging to the EOS network will be available as usual. Be aware of the risks associated with the spot, margin, and derivatives trading of these tokens, and make sure you increase your margin to lower your risk.

  * For the safety of your funds, **don’t** make any further deposits or withdrawals of EOS tokens and tokens belonging to the network during the period.

  

For more details on the network upgrade, please visit:

  * [ _EOS Upgrade_](https://eosnetwork.com/blog/spring-1-0-rc1-released/)

  

OKX team

September 24, 2024

title: OKX to support MATIC token migration
body:
According to the [official plan of
Polygon](https://polygon.technology/blog/save-the-date-matic-pol-migration-
coming-september-4th-everything-you-need-to-know), the MATIC token will be
undergoing a token migration and will be upgraded to POL.

OKX will support MATIC migration to POL as per the following schedule:

**1\. Deposits and withdrawals**

  1. MATIC deposits and withdrawals on the Polygon PoS Network will be suspended at 3:00 am UTC on August 30, 2024, and will no longer be supported after the token conversion is complete.
  2. MATIC deposits and withdrawals on the ERC20 Mainnet will be suspended at 9:00 am UTC on September 9, 2024, and will no longer be supported.
  3. POL deposits on ERC20 Mainnet will open at 2:00 am UTC on September 3, 2024.
  4. POL withdrawals on ERC20 Mainnet will open at 2:00 pm UTC on September 4, 2024.
  5. POL deposits on Polygon PoS will open at 1:00 pm UTC on September 9, 2024. The schedule for POL on Polygon PoS withdrawals will be announced separately.

**2\. Trading instruments**

  1. Spot trading  
1\. POL/USDT call auctions will take place from 12:00 pm to 1:00 pm UTC on
September 4, 2024, and spot trading will open at 1:00 pm UTC on September 4,
2024.  
2\. POL/USDC spot trading will open at 2:00 pm UTC on September 4, 2024.  
3\. OKX will delist MATIC/USDT, MATIC/USDC, MATIC/EUR spot trading pairs and
terminate any related orders at 11:00 am UTC on September 7, 2024.  
4\. Please cancel all orders before 8:00 am UTC on September 7, 2024. Our
system will cancel any outstanding orders after this time.  
5\. In order to mitigate market risks, OKX will adjust the trading amount
precision and tick size before delisting the MATIC/USDT spot trading pair. The
trading amount precision will be adjusted from 0.000001 to 0.00001, and the
tick size will be adjusted from 0.0001 to 0.0000001. This adjustment will be
made without further notice.  
 **At the time of delisting, orders placed by trading bots for the above-
mentioned pairs will be canceled, and bots will be stopped. Any related pairs
or positions will be sold or closed at the market price at that time.**

  2. Margin trading  
1\. MATIC borrowing feature will cease at 3:00 am on August 29, 2024.  
2\. OKX will suspend margin trading and flexible loans between 8:00 am and
11:00 am UTC on September 3, 2024 and open orders for margin will be canceled.  
3\. Please settle any outstanding loans before 8:00 am UTC on September 3,
2024. A forced payment will be triggered if unpaid borrowings remain due by
the delisting time.  
4\. An adjustment to the discount of the MATIC token will be made at 8:00 am
on September 3, 2024.

Asset | Before | After  
---|---|---  
Tier (USD) | Discount rate | Tier (USD) | Discount rate  
MATIC | 0 - 1,000,000 | 0.8 | 0 | 0  
1,000,000 - 2,000,000 | 0.75  
2,000,000 - 4,000,000 | 0.5  
> 4,000,000 | 0  
  
  3. Perpetual futures  
OKX will delist MATICUSDT perpetual futures and terminate any related orders
at 8:00 am UTC on September 4, 2024. Relevant orders in the order book will
also be canceled after the delisting. OKX will deliver all the above-mentioned
perpetual futures positions at the arithmetic average price of the
corresponding OKX index between 7:00 am and 8:00 am UTC.  
If the index price displays abnormalities during the above-stated time
preceding the delisting, OKX may adjust the final delivery price to a
reasonable level for delivery.

The current funding rate at 8:00 am UTC on the day of delisting will be 0.
Thus, funding fees for this period will not be included in the billing record.

Considering that the market may fluctuate sharply before the delisting, please
manage your risk level by reducing the actual leverage multiples or closing
positions in advance.

  4. Converting, P2P Express, and other related features  
OKX will cease support for converting, P2P Express and all other related
features for MATIC trading at 8:00 am UTC on September 7, 2024. Place your
orders well ahead of the cut-off time to avoid order cancellation or failure.

**3\. Token migration**

  1. On-chain Earn subscriptions and redemptions for MATIC will be suspended starting from September 4, 2024. Staked assets will be automatically converted to POL from September 4. The migration is expected to be completed by September 7. In this period, earnings will continue to accumulate as usual and will be distributed after the migration. On-chain Earn POL staking will reopen once the migration is complete.
  2. At 10:00 am UTC on September 9, 2024, an account snapshot on the user’s funding account will be performed, and the user’s MATIC holdings will be converted into POL at a 1:1 ratio. A separate announcement will be made once the migration is complete.  
1\. Related assets in the trading account will be transferred to the funding
account for the snapshot.  
2\. At the time of the snapshot, any MATIC tokens that are being withdrawn or
yet to be deposited successfully will not be included in the migration.  
3\. MATIC tokens held in sub-accounts will be converted into POL and
transferred to the main account once the migration is complete.  
4\. Holdings under 1 MATIC will not be included in the migration.

  3. The token migration is expected to take 1 - 3 days. During this period, your MATIC valuation will be unavailable. Once the migration is complete, all your MATIC will be converted to POL, and MATIC will no longer be shown in your asset list.

title: Withdrawal of OKX HK's VASP license application
body:
Dear Hong Kong customers,

After careful consideration of our business strategy, OKX HK has decided to
withdraw its VASP license application at this time.

Accordingly, OKX must cease to provide centralized virtual asset trading
services to Hong Kong residents by 31 May 2024 (Friday). Customer funds remain
safe and withdrawal services will not be affected. After 31 May 2024, Hong
Kong customers will only be able to withdraw.

OKX Web3 (self-hosted wallet) services are not affected and will remain
available to Hong Kong users.

 **Please note:**

  1. Do not deposit into your OKX account after 31 May 2024. Deposits made after _31 May 2024 (23:59:59 HKT)_ may not be automatically credited. Kindly contact our customer support at service@okx.com if needed.

  2. Any open orders that are not closed by _31 May 2024 (23:59:59 HKT)_ will be cancelled. The resulting funds will be transferred to your OKX account balance.

  3. You may withdraw assets from your OKX account to your self-custody wallet or your accounts on other third-party platforms between now and _31 August 2024 (23:59:59 HKT)_ (“ **Closure Date** ”). Your assets will remain safe in your OKX account until the Closure Date.

  4. After the Closure Date, you will not be able to initiate any request to directly withdraw or transfer assets from your OKX account. After the Closure Date, any remaining balances in your OKX account will be deemed as unclaimed property and we will treat them in accordance with our terms of use.

Should you have any additional questions, please contact our customer service
team at service@okx.com.

title: Wallet updates and token adjustments at OKX in EEA
body:
We are updating our wallets for users residing in the European Economic Area
(EEA) or incorporated in the EEA. This will change some of your deposit
addresses as well as the tokens that our wallets can support. The impacted
token list can be found below. This change is part of our ongoing efforts to
provide you with a safe and reliable experience on our platform.

#### Updated Wallet Addresses:

  * New Wallet Addresses: Starting April 30th, we have deployed new wallet addresses. Please log into your account, navigate to the deposit section, and update your records with the new addresses.

  * Deposits to Old Addresses: Deposits made to old wallet addresses after this announcement will not automatically be credited to your account. Please use the new wallet addresses for all future transactions.

  * Need Help? If you accidentally send funds to an old address, contact our customer support team. We will do our best to assist you.

### Discontinuation of Specific Tokens

We are notifying you that the tokens below will no longer be supported. Please
contact customer support to withdraw these tokens from your OKX account:

#### Affected Tokens:

  * Monero (XMR)

  * Symbol (XYM)

  * Bifrost (BNC)

  * YOYOW (YOYO)

  * EncrypGen (DNA)

trust in OKX.

title: Exclusive for Dutch Users - Join Us and the McLaren Racing Team for a Full VIP Trackside Experience in Italy
body:
We're excited to launch a new giveaway, exclusively for our Dutch community.
One lucky user will have the opportunity to win two tickets to a VIP trackside
experience in Italy, set for May 17 to May 19, in full McLaren Racing style.  
The winner, along with their guest, will receive McLaren Racing trackside
experience tickets, granting them:

  * Access to the event and full McLaren Racing trackside experience each day;

  * A top-tier hospitality experience complete with hotel stay, fine dining, a pit view overlooking the McLaren Racing garage, pit lane walks and appearances with the McLaren Racing team; and

  * Two free flight tickets.

  
This giveaway is our way of celebrating the launch of our Dutch X account,
following our recent rebrand from Okcoin Europe Ltd. to OKX, and the
availability of our platform's beta mode in the Netherlands.  
  
 **To enter the giveaway, eligible participants simply need to complete the
following steps:**

  * Both the participant and their guest need to be eligible Dutch residents with a [verified account](/en-eu/account/kyc/personal/overview) with us;

  * Follow our [X account](https://twitter.com/OKXDutch); and

  * Retweet our [McLaren Racing post](https://twitter.com/OKXDutch/status/1783860380206330197), and respond by tagging three friends.

  
The giveaway closes on May 5, 2024 and we will be reaching out to the lucky
winner on May 6, 2024 **.** We are looking forward to your entries!

  
 **Please note that following terms and conditions apply:**

  1.  _Promotion period: April 26th, 2024 until May 5th, 2024 (UTC)_

  2.  _Valid to OKX users only_

  3.  _Limit 1 entry per participant_

  4.  _Prizes will be sent to the winners' OKX accounts within 30 or more working days after the promotion ends_

  5.  _In case of any dispute, OKX reserves the right of final decision_

 _  
_ ** _Note:  
_** _To the extent permitted by law, neither OKX nor McLaren Racing Limited
accepts any liability for any expense, damage, loss or injury suffered
(including loss of opportunity) whether direct, indirect, special or
consequential, arising in any way due to entering this promotion or taking up
a prize. McLaren Racing Limited are not responsible for any third-party acts
or omissions._

title: OKX to support GF token migration
body:

migration to ZENT at a 1:10 ratio, according to the schedule below:

  1. All pending GF token orders will be canceled, and the GF/USDT spot trading pair will be delisted at **8:00 am UTC on April 26, 2024**.

  2. GF transfers, deposits, and withdrawals will be suspended at **10:00 am UTC on April 26, 2024**.

  3. An account snapshot and the subsequent token migration will take place at **4:00 pm UTC on April 26, 2024**.

The snapshot will take place in both OKX funding and trading accounts. New
token ZENT deposits, withdrawals, and spot trading will open after token
migration. The specific opening time for these services will be announced
separately.

title: OKX to support Optimism and Arbitrum mainnet upgrade
body:
We are excited to announce we will be supporting the Optimism and Arbitrum
network’s mainnet upgrade.

  * Regarding the Optimism network upgrade:
    * The Optimism network upgrade and hard fork will take place at approximately 12:00 am UTC on March 14, 2024.
    * Deposits and withdrawals of OP tokens and tokens belonging to its network will be suspended at 11:00 pm UTC on March 13, 2024.
  * Regarding the Arbitrum network upgrade: 
    * The Arbitrum network upgrade and hard fork will take place at approximately 8:00 am UTC on March 14, 2024.
    * Deposits and withdrawals of ARB tokens and tokens belonging to its network will be suspended at 7:00 am UTC on March 14, 2024.
  * We will resume deposits and withdrawals for impacted tokens on the OP and ARB networks once the upgraded networks are stable. We won’t be making a separate announcement once this is complete.
  * For the safety of your funds, do not make any further withdrawals or deposits of OP and ARB tokens and tokens belonging to its network during the upgrade period.

Please note:

  * The trading of OP and ARB tokens and tokens belonging to the OP and ARB networks won’t be affected during this network upgrade. Please be aware of the risks associated with the spot, margin, and derivatives trading of these tokens, and make sure you increase your margin to lower your risk.
  * You don’t need to do anything if you hold any OP or ARB tokens and tokens belonging to the OP or ARB network in your account. We will handle all technical requirements involved.

For more details on the network upgrade, please visit:

  * [Ecotone OP Mainnet Upgrade](https://docs.optimism.io/builders/notices/ecotone-changes)

title: OKX Brasil x McLaren Racing Trading Campaign
body:
**1\. Campaign Organizer**  
 _OKX Serviços Digitais Ltda._ , a limited liability company registered in
Brazil under CNPJ no. 50.459.025/0001-26, with its registered office at
Avenida Brigadeiro Faria Lima, n. 4055, floor 101, room 01-103, Itaim Bibi, in
the City of São Paulo, State of São Paulo, ZIP Code 01318-903 ("OKX Brazil").
For the avoidance of doubt _McLaren Racing Limited_ is not the Campaign
Organizer and therefore assumes no liability in relation to these Terms and
Conditions.

**2\. Eligibility**  
Participants must be individuals residing in Brazil, have registered on the
OKX platform from June 15, 2023, and have their account approved in the "Know
Your Customer" (KYC) process. Market makers aren't eligible for this campaign.

**3\. Campaign Period**  
The campaign is valid from February 15, 2024 to March 15, 2024 or until all
stocks of McLaren products are distributed. OKX may, at its sole discretion,
terminate or extend the campaign deadline.

**4\. Promotion Details**

  * **Tier 1 (4 kits):** Users who trade between R$ 500,000.00 and R$ 999,999.99 in crypto assets from February 15, 2024 to March 15, 2024 will receive a kit containing the official McLaren cap, official McLaren t-shirt, and official McLaren bag.
  * **Tier 2 (3 kits):** Users who trade above R$ 1,000,000.00 in crypto assets from February 15, 2024 to March 15, 2024 will receive a kit containing the official McLaren cap, official McLaren t-shirt, official McLaren bag, official McLaren backpack, and official McLaren jacket.

**5\. Registration for the Promotion**  
Users must register for the promotion through the official typeform linked
below provided by OKX Brazil to be considered eligible to receive the prizes.
[Register Form.](https://okx.typeform.com/to/bZHU37KX)

**6\. Stock and Sizes**  
Prizes are subject to availability (4 Tier 1 kits and 3 Tier 2 kits). OKX
Brazil will make every effort to meet the size preferences indicated on the
registration form. However, if the desired size is not available, the nearest
available size will be sent.

**7\. Reservation of Rights**  
OKX Brazil reserves the right to modify, suspend, or cancel the campaign at
any time and without prior notice for any reason it deems necessary.

**8\. General**

  * Participation in the campaign implies full and unconditional acceptance of all terms and conditions.
  * OKX Brazil will not be responsible for any communication failure, technical issues, fraud, delays, or failures that may affect the user's registration or participation in the campaign.
  * All decisions made by OKX Brazil regarding the campaign are final and binding.

By participating in this campaign, you confirm that you have read, understood,
and agreed to these Terms and Conditions.

title: OKX Brazil is updating its terms of service
body:
We are excited to introduce you to OKX SERVIÇOS DIGITAIS LTDA., the dedicated
entity of OKX for Brazilian residents. As part of this new service, you will
be able to interact with a platform fully designed for our Brazilian users,
including full local customer support and the ability to make deposits and
withdrawals in cash (BRL) in your OKX account, making your digital
transactions smoother and more convenient.

As part of the migration to the new entity, it is important that users only
have tokens available at the local entity. If they have tokens that are not
available locally, users have two options before the migration:

  1. Conversion of the unavailable token for an available token.
  2. Withdrawal of the unavailable token to a different wallet.

If no action is taken by the users before the migration, the locally
unavailable tokens will be frozen and can only be withdrawn to another wallet.
[Check the list with the tokens available in the local entity.](/en-
eu/help/criptoativos-listados-na-okx-brasil)

Additionally, please set your Trading accounts and subaccounts to "No Margin"
mode and complete identity verification by the date mentioned in the email we
sent to your registered address, or your account will be frozen. But rest
assured, you will still have full access to withdraw your funds at any time.

Please take a moment to close all margin positions, as well as positions in
perpetuals, futures, and options (if any). Furthermore, redeem all funds from
the Grow products: Earn, Loan, or Jumpstart (if any).

We look forward to serving you even better and continue being part of your
digital asset journey.

Sincerely,  
OKX Team

title: OKX to optimize funding rate calculation
body:
To continually improve the trading experience for our traders, OKX will adjust
the calculation for average premium index. The update is scheduled for 8:00 am
UTC on March 5, 2024 and will not affect other calculation logic or change the
outcome during funding rate settlement.

  
Funding rate formula:

Funding rate = Clamp[Average premium index, Funding cap, Funding floor]  
To elaborate further,  
Average premium index = MA(Premium index – Interest rate)  
Interest rate = 0  
Premium index = [(Best bid + Best offer) / 2 – Index price] / Index price  
MA refers to the moving average and it is calculated every minute

  
 **Before the switch：**

Funding rate will be calculated using the premium index of each minute from
the start of the period to present. Example (in 24-hour time):

 **Most recent settlement time**

|

 **Current time**

|

 **Timeframe used to calculate funding rate**  
  
---|---|---  
  
16:00

|

16:10

|

16:00 - 16:10  
  
16:00

|

17:00

|

 **After the switch:**

Funding rate will be calculated using premium index of each minute over the
last N hours till present.  
To elaborate further,  
“N hours” refers to the number of hours between each settlement period. If
funding fees are settled every 8 hours, N = 8.

 **Most recent settlement time**

|

01:00

|

17:01 - 01:00  
  
  
 **Impact after the switch:**

For perpetual futures that use current-cycle settlement, the current funding
rate at 23:59 will be used to settle funding fees at 00:00. There will not be
any difference in the outcome before and after the switch during settlement.  
For perpetual futures that use cross-cycle settlement, it will only affect the
next funding rate calculations and will not affect how the current funding
rate is calculated.  

 **API interface**

Post-adjustment, the API endpoint (/api/v5/public/funding-rate) and the
Websocket channel (funding-rate) will follow the rules mentioned above.
