title: OKX to upgrade the asset system
body:
To optimize our services and user experience, OKX will conduct an asset system
upgrade from 6:30-6:40 am UTC on Jan 25, 2024. The 10-minute upgrade timing
may vary based on ‌actual circumstances.

The following features will be unavailable during this upgrade: deposits,
withdrawals, transfers, Convert, financial products (Simple Earn, Structured
Products, On-chain Earn, Loan), Buy with card, P2P trading, red packets,
mystery boxes, etc. Website access and record viewing will remain unaffected
during this period.

During the upgrade period, traders with open positions will be unable to add
margins through a transfer. Please evaluate your account risk based on the
margin level of your position/account and, if necessary, add margins
beforehand.

Thank you for your understanding and support. We’ll be committed to providing
you with superior products and services!

Regards,  
OKX team

title: Second round of Polkadot slot auctions: more DOT unlocked
body:
All DOT locked up from the second round of the Polkadot slot auctions will be
unlocked starting from January 16, 2024. OKX will roll out the unlocking and
redemption process in two phases.

**Phase One** : The OKDOT2/DOT trading pair will be delisted on January 16,
2024, at 08:00 UTC.  
 **Phase Two** : All OKDOT2 will be redeemed for locked DOT at a 1:1 ratio
between January 16 to 25, 2024.

All redeemed DOT will be distributed to your funding account.

Please note that once the OKDOT2/DOT trading pair is delisted, you won't be
able to convert OKDOT2 to DOT until the second round settlements are
completed. Additionally, due to the uncertainty of Polkadot on-chain
operations, please refer to future announcements to get the exact settlement
completion time.

We'll keep working to provide you with better products and services!

title: OKX to support dYdX Chain
body:
In order to meet users’ demand for trading, we will start supporting the DYDX
native chain.  

  * DYDX_DYDX deposits will open at 3:00 am UTC on January 12, 2024.

  * DYDX_DYDX withdrawals will temporarily not be supported.

  
About dYdX Chain  
The dYdX Chain is an open-source, fully decentralized standalone app-chain
released by dYdX. It includes the complete code for the protocol, orderbook,
and front end, emphasizing the core belief in full decentralization. Offering
unprecedented transaction speeds of up to 2,000 transactions per second in the
DeFi space, the dYdX Chain is designed to provide transparency and security to
derivatives trading, empowering users and marking a significant step in
democratizing access to financial opportunities.

OKX team  
January 11, 2024

title: OKX to support Optimism mainnet upgrade
body:
We are excited to announce we will be supporting the Optimism network’s
mainnet upgrade.

  * The Optimism network upgrade and hard fork will take place at approximately 5:00 pm UTC on January 11, 2024.

  * Deposits and withdrawals of OP tokens and tokens belonging to its network will be suspended at 3:00 pm UTC on January 11, 2024.

  * We will resume deposits and withdrawals for impacted tokens on the OP network once the upgraded OP network is stable. We won’t be making a separate announcement once this is complete.

  * For the safety of your funds, **do not** make any further withdrawals or deposits of OP tokens and tokens belonging to its network during the upgrade period.

  
Please note:

  * The trading of OP tokens and tokens belonging to the OP networks won’t be affected during this network upgrade. Please be aware of the risks associated with the spot, margin, and derivatives trading of these tokens, and make sure you increase your margin to lower your risk.

  * You don’t need to do anything if you hold any OP tokens and tokens belonging to the OP network in your account. We will handle all technical requirements involved.

  
For more details on the network upgrade, please visit:
<https://docs.optimism.io/builders/node-operators/network-
upgrades/overview#activations>  

OKX team

January 11, 2024

title: OKX to support the BRC20 Jubilee upgrade
body:
We are excited to announce we will be supporting the BRC20 Jubilee upgrade.

  * The BRC20 network upgrade will take place at block height #824,544.
  * Deposits and withdrawals of ORDI, SATS, and all other BRC20 network tokens will be suspended at 10:00 am UTC on January 5, 2024.
  * We will resume deposits and withdrawals for ORDI, SATS, and all other BRC20 network tokens once the upgraded network is stable. We won’t be making a separate announcement once this is complete.
  * For the safety of your funds, do not make any further withdrawals or deposits of ORDI, SATS, and all other BRC20 network tokens during the upgrade period.

Please note:

  * The trading of ORDI, SATS, and all other BRC20 network tokens won’t be affected during this network upgrade. Please be aware of the risks associated with the spot, margin, and derivatives trading of these tokens, and make sure you increase your margin to lower your risk.
  * You don’t need to do anything if you hold any ORDI, SATS, and all other BRC20 network tokens in your account. We will handle all technical requirements involved.

OKX team  
January 4, 2024
